answers.answer: You could call into your doctor's office or Labor & Delivery and see what they suggest.  If it is a lot different than usual, be insistent and see if they will do a scan.
You probably just had a lot of caffeine or sugar and now the baby is partying it up in there!

I had no sugar actually i bc i have diabetes....i wish thats what it was from, i have no idea why he was so active but it ended up being a very long night and i began some braxton hicks so it also became a painful night as well.

question: Ok this is going to sound very strage, but is there such a thing as the baby is moving too much? My little guy hasnt stopped moving for the past two hours, i am just afraid he is going to get himslf wrapped up in his cord and something terrible is going to happen. I hope i am not the only one who has thought of this. now i dont want him to stop moving.
title: baby movements
